Reviews.Title: “Well located, very well managed - great assistance - unique.”
Reviews.Author: PacoCapeTown
Reviews.Content: Great to stay in NY on business trip, living in apartment in the Upper East Side: the residence is strategically located (short walking distance from bus, subway, restaurants and shops), very clean and fully equipped; professional staff. Safe and very interesting area, nice atmosphere. Corrado, Cape Town, South Africa

HotelInfo.Name: Central Park Suite
HotelInfo.Address: 59 East 73rd Street, New York City, NY
